biotools.summary: MIREyA (MIRnas functioning through Enhancer Activation) is a computational approach to detect miRNA-directed gene activation. It is a pipeline for detection of miRNAs and their gene targets up-regulated through triggering their enhancer in the provided expression

bioschemas.name: MIREyA
